text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump 116,000. NUMBER OF DEAD AMERICANS.

2 MILLION. NUMBER OF AMERICANS INFECTED.

ZERO. NUMBER OF FUCKS GIVEN BY YOU OR YOUR ADMINISTRATION FOR THE CONTINUED DEATH AND DESTRUCTION OF CORONAVIRUS.

NOVEMBER 3, 2020. DAY OF RECKONING. https://t.co/FbBLG5dl92
